MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 01.36am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working on an underground mains fault at Shotts affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:57am on Friday, 30 October 2020.
